text: @pulte Not right now. I haven’t made a dime since November. I usually don’t make money (self-employed small business) Nov, Dec, Jan and maybe Feb but covid19 has stretched that to a no-longer doable timeline. I love & appreciate that you care enough to try to make a difference though.
